ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham

Class OSXIntegration

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.OSXIntegration

  • public final class OSXIntegration
extends Object
    Integrates the main application window more closely with the operating system on the OS X platform. This class must be public for technical reasons. It is not meant for use for by plug-in developers.
    Since:
    3.0
